oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Omkostningsberegning ved fremstilling af nye kødprodukter i BerryMeat
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hansen, Flemming
Olesen, Bent
Kern-Hansen, Ulrich
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
Food security, food quality and human health
Markets and trade
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A brief calculation of the extra costs when using herbs & berries in the 2 new organic meat-products developed in BerryMeat.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Hansen, Flemming; Olesen, Bent and Kern-Hansen, Ulrich (2014) Omkostningsberegning ved fremstilling af nye kødprodukter i BerryMeat. Danish Meat Research Institute.
